verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Kristu ni yule yule,
Kristu ni yule yule,
yule yule,
(jana na leo)
na hata milele. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Yeye ndiye aliye hai,
ndiye aliyeko,
aliyekuwako na atakayekuja
Bwana wa nyakati zote.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Karne zote ni zake yeye,
utukufu wake hapa duniani,
na enzi yake yote
daima milele yote.
